CustomField.description: Secret question for portal user verification
CustomField.label: Secret Question

value.fullName: In what city were you born?
value.label: In what city were you born?

value.fullName: What is your mother's maiden name?
value.label: What is your mother's maiden name?

value.fullName: In what city did you meet your spouse/significant other?
value.label: In what city did you meet your spouse/significant other?

value.fullName: What is the name of your favorite childhood friend?
value.label: What is the name of your favorite childhood friend?

value.fullName: In what city was your first job?
value.label: In what city was your first job?
